data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Fukushima, Japan.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fukushima, Japan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Fukushima, Japan need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 176 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Fukushima, Japan to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Fukushima, Japan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Deaf people.
Spirit, help the 11,487 believers in Fukushima to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Lord, to the people of Fukushima you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Fukushima, Japan has a population of 2,028,800.

We estimate Fukushima has 11,487 people who might know Jesus, 32,393 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,984,921 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 176 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Fukushima who will make disciples who make disciples.
